GamePackage

Interface BlackjackInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Blackjack

    public interface BlackjackInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • generateHand

        java.util.List<Card> generateHand()
        Generate Hand
        Returns:
        A list of two cards is returned for the hand.
        Ensure:
        A blackjack deck is shuffled and two cards are drawn.
        Require:
        A valid blackjack deck is created and the player starts a game.

      • hit

        Card hit()
        Hit
        Returns:
        The top card is returned after the deck has been shuffled.
        Ensure:
        A blackjack deck is shuffled and the first card is drawn.
        Require:
        A valid blackjack deck is created.

      • getSum

        int getSum(java.util.List<Card> hand)
        Get Sum
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards for an individual player.
        Returns:
        The int value of the total sum of cards in the hand.
        Ensure:
        The card values of an individual hand is summed together.
        Require:
        Dealing, hitting, and checking winner will all lead to getting the sum to help determine the winner.

      • checkBust

        boolean checkBust(java.util.List<Card> hand)
        Check Bust
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards for an individual player.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the player's hand has busted (sum over 21).
        Ensure:
        The card values of an individual hand is summed together, and if greater than 21, return true, else return false.
        Require:
        Dealing, hitting, and checking winner will all lead to getting the truth value of checking if busted in order to help determine the winner.

      • checkWinner

        int checkWinner(java.util.List<Card> playerHand,
                java.util.List<Card> houseHand)
        Check Winner
        Parameters:
        playerHand - The user-controlled player hand.
        houseHand - The house hand.
        Returns:
        The int value based on win, lose, or tie.
        Ensure:
        Determines whether each player wins against the house.
        Require:
        All user-controlled players to be standing or busted.
